name: Vroom Service
description:
The elevator has broken down in Prompt Room Service Hotel, and you have to hold to the hotel's brand! Drive through the building on your motorcycle, delivering orders to the appropriate room, while avoiding messes in the halls. You might even jump out a window for a quick escape to the bottom floor!

Controls

A/D - Move Left/Right
W - Jump
E - Get Food, Deliver Food, Go Upstairs, Jump out Window
